sentences.sContent: Several things can be done to help the snake acclimate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Several things can be done to help the snake acclimate.
sentences.sCn: 可以通过几件事帮助这些蛇去适应新环境。

sentences.sContent: Some earth plants that I will try to acclimate to the moon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some earth plants that I will try to acclimate to the moon.
sentences.sCn: 我将设法使一些地球植物适应月球的环境。

remMethod.val: ac (加强) + climate (气候， 水土) → 服水土 → 使适应新环境

words.tran: 适应环境；[动][进化] 驯化；服水土；[气候] 气候适应
使适应新环境，使服水土
